title: Taffi AI
description: AI cosmetics platform using a YOLO face-analysis pipeline. Built and deployed the CV model and full FastAPI inference workflow.

title: Yaklabs IoT Platform
description: IoT backend for device provisioning, telemetry ingestion, and real-time analytics. Built core architecture, Flask services, and PyTorch models.

title: Mini CRM
description: Lead-routing CRM with operator load balancing and real-time updates. Designed routing logic and built the FastAPI + PostgreSQL backend.

title: E-Commerce Marketplace
description: Multi-vendor marketplace with product management and order workflows. Developed backend architecture and payment integration.

title: AI Chatbot
description: AI assistant system with prompt pipeline and dashboard. Built backend, OpenAI integration, and message routing.

title: Smart School Management System
description: API-first school management platform with multi-role access and admin tools. Built core Django modules and REST endpoints.

title: Custom Auth System
description: Custom authentication and authorization system built with Django REST Framework and PostgreSQL, implementing session-based authentication and role-based access control (RBAC).

title: Realtime Chat Platform
description: Full-stack real-time chat application built with FastAPI and Next.js, featuring WebSocket connections, Redis pub/sub, and PostgreSQL.
